text: The Asian Hockey Federation (AHF) is the governing body for the sport of field hockey in Asia. It is responsible for promoting, organizing, and regulating field hockey activities across the continent under International Hockey Federation. ==Members== * Afghanistan * Bangladesh * Brunei * Cambodia * China * Chinese Taipei * Hong Kong * India * Indonesia * Iran * Japan * Kazakhstan * Korea * Korea (DPR) * Macau * Malaysia * Mongolia * Myanmar * Nepal * Oman * Pakistan * Philippines * Qatar * Saudi Arabia * Singapore * Sri Lanka * Tajikistan * Thailand * Timor-Leste * Turkmenistan * United Arab Emirates * Uzbekistan * Vietnam == References == Category:Sports governing bodies in Asia
title: Asian Hockey Federation
